title: Cisco DNA-C as a Platform
abstract: Cisco DNA Center is the foundational controller and analytics Center at the heart of Cisco's intent-based network. DNA Center supports the expression of intent for multiple use cases, including base automation capabilities, fabric provisioning, and policy-based segmentation in the enterprise network. DNA Center adds context to this journey through the introduction of Analytics and Assurance. DNA Center provides end-to-end visibility into the network with full context through data and insights
booktitle: Proceedings of the 24th Annual International Conference on Mobile Computing and Networking
